If you prefer something more heartfelt and character-driven, "What's Eating Gilbert Grape" might be right up your alley. This film showcases an outstanding performance by Leonardo DiCaprio as a young man caring for his mentally disabled brother and morbidly obese mother.

If you're up for something a bit more grounded, "Get Low" (2009) might be right up your alley. This quirky drama stars Bill Murray as a hermit who throws his own rollicking funeral party while he's still alive. It's a truly unique and heartwarming tale. Enjoy!
